items.title: Vision Pro 前景未卜，所有头显开发似乎已暂停 (原标题: Vision Pro Future Uncertain as All Headset Development Is Seemingly Paused)
items.creator: Hartley Charlton
items.summary:
# Vision Pro 前景未卜：苹果暂停所有头显开发，转向智能眼镜

## Vision Pro 的发布与市场反应
苹果在2023年中期发布Vision Pro时，将其描述为“空间计算”的开端，一个有望与iPhone匹敌的新范式。然而，尽管其3499美元的高昂价格、复杂设计和全新操作系统表明它并非面向大众市场，但市场热情消退的速度远超预期。据传闻，苹果雄心勃勃的多年路线图已几乎崩溃。

![apple vision pro orange](https://images.macrumors.com/t/B5DWG5LPPxi5VSviPK0plzN4KXg=/400x0/article-new/2024/07/apple-vision-pro-orange.jpg?lossy)

## 苹果的原始计划
Vision Pro发布后不久，苹果据称将重心转向“Vision Air”，旨在通过更轻、更薄、更便宜的头显将空间计算带给更广泛的受众。

*   **Vision Air 目标：**
    *   减重超过40%，降价约50%。
    *   使用成本更低的显示面板和简化光学元件。
    *   取消一些非必要功能，改善人体工程学。
    *   目标是使混合现实对主流消费者更具吸引力。
*   **Vision Pro 2 设想：**
    *   作为高端旗舰，原计划在Vision Air发布后推出，时间后来推迟到2028年。
    *   特点：更轻、更舒适的设计，更先进的显示屏，更长的电池续航，更低的价格。
    *   产品结构：Vision Air和Vision Pro 2将建立类似iPhone、iPad、MacBook和AirPods的双层产品结构。

![Apple Vision Pro 2 Feature 2](https://images.macrumors.com/t/qIGvgZzgODzK1uMNtNLzZRGMx2Y=/400x0/article-new/2024/03/Apple-Vision-Pro-2-Feature-2.jpg?lossy)

## 路线图的重大变化
到2024年中期，Vision Pro的开发势头似乎发生转变，未来产品计划被重新调整。

*   **Vision Pro 2 开发暂停：**
    *   The Information报道称，苹果已暂停Vision Pro 2的开发，将工程资源重新分配给更便宜的Vision Air，以期加速其发布。
    *   原因：苹果认识到Vision Pro的高成本、笨重、不适和有限用例，即使在早期采用者中也缩小了其吸引力。
*   **Vision Air 开发困境：**
    *   苹果在降低Vision Air成本而不牺牲过多功能方面遇到困难。
    *   原计划2024年底发布，但到年中仍未有确定的原型，发布日期推迟到2025年底。
*   **第一代 Vision Pro 停产：**
    *   到10月，供应链泄露消息表明，由于需求疲软和组件库存过剩，苹果正在逐步停止生产初代Vision Pro。
    *   据信，第一代Vision Pro已于年底停产。

![Midnight Vision Pro Mock Feature](https://images.macrumors.com/t/QhCU-LmEHBp5EuNPjz7yyiYlGb0=/400x0/article-new/2025/04/Midnight-Vision-Pro-Mock-Feature.jpg?lossy)

## 头显开发全面暂停
本月，彭博社的重磅报道指出，苹果也已暂停了低成本头显“Vision Air”的开发工作。

*   **转向智能眼镜：** 苹果显然希望加快智能眼镜产品的开发，以更好地与Meta竞争。
*   **现状：** 如果彭博社和The Information的报道属实，那么Vision Air和重新设计的Vision Pro的开发都已暂停，目前没有头显类硬件在积极开发中。
*   **未来方向：** 尽管苹果不太可能完全放弃空间计算，但其下一步行动几乎肯定会与2024年推出的头显大相径庭。

![vision pro video recording](https://images.macrumors.com/t/ZeahY6kmrKaz6-k51jg6J8ZfqHk=/400x0/article-new/2023/06/vision-pro-video-recording.jpg?lossy)

## M5 Vision Pro 的推出
当前的Vision Pro仍使用2022年的M2芯片，而苹果即将推出M5系列芯片。

*   **硬件刷新：** 苹果据信已决定简单地刷新现有硬件，配备M5芯片，可能还有第二代协处理器“R2”芯片，以及新的“双织带”头带。
*   **目的：** 这将使现有设备在未来几年保持更新，同时利用第一代型号剩余的组件库存。
*   **发布时间：** 这款设备预计将在未来几周内发布，甚至已通过FCC备案泄露。

![apple vision pro chips](https://images.macrumors.com/t/bbRKhoqe7LYQl60tpdRFEhPUw54=/400x0/article-new/2023/06/apple-vision-pro-chips.jpg?lossy)

## 未来展望
M5 Vision Pro应能为喜欢该设备的用户或潜在客户提供合理的更新，但它仍然不太可能获得大众吸引力或带来根本不同的体验。

*   **过渡产品：** 该设备可能会在一段时间内支持头显产品线，但如果苹果不提供后续产品，它最终将成为过时型号。
*   **智能眼镜优先：** 苹果预计最早明年推出其首款智能眼镜产品。一旦眼镜计划稳定，公司有可能恢复Vision Air和Vision Pro 2的开发。
*   **不确定性：** 然而，到2027年至2028年左右，苹果的头显可能会进入一个尴尬境地，即旧硬件仍在销售，但没有更新或替代型号的迹象。
*   **承诺与转向：** 目前，visionOS 26和即将到来的M5刷新表明苹果仍致力于混合现实头显，但在突然转向智能眼镜和人工智能的背景下，该产品线的未来走向仍是未知数。

![Apple Vision Pro Demo](https://images.macrumors.com/t/5fzqkAfyZsXhX7TYjOW7Mchd7IY=/400x0/article-new/2024/02/Apple-Vision-Pro-Demo.jpeg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 苹果已暂停Vision Pro所有未来头显（包括Vision Pro 2和更便宜的Vision Air）的开发工作，转而将重心放在智能眼镜上。Vision Pro的市场反应不佳，导致其雄心勃勃的路线图崩溃，第一代产品已停产。苹果将通过M5芯片和新头带刷新现有Vision Pro硬件，以维持产品线，但其长期前景仍不明朗，未来可能在智能眼镜稳定后才考虑恢复头显开发。
items.translated_title: Vision Pro 前景未卜，所有头显开发似乎已暂停
items.content:
Recent reports suggest that there are now no redesigned Apple Vision headsets in active development, with the company's focus pivoting decisively to smart glasses.


When Apple announced the Vision Pro in mid-2023, it described the device as the dawn of "spatial computing," a new paradigm that would eventually rival the iPhone in importance. With a $3,499 starting price, intricate design and brand new operating system, and a clear focus on premium early adopters, the headset was never expected to be mass-market from day one. Yet even by Apple's standards, enthusiasm cooled far faster than anticipated, and the company's once-ambitious multi-year roadmap has now all but collapsed, according to rumors.

Apple's Original Plan


Soon after the launch of the Vision Pro, Apple is believed to have shifted focus to the "Vision Air," designed to bring spatial computing to a wider audience thanks to a lighter, thinner, and dramatically cheaper headset.


The target was to cut both weight by over 40% and price by around 50%, finally making mixed-reality viable for mainstream buyers. The Vision Air would use lower-cost display panels and simplified optics, while dropping some non-essential aspects and improving ergonomics.

At the high end, Apple reportedly envisioned a redesigned Vision Pro 2 to be launched sometime after the Vision Air's debut, and that timeframe eventually slipped to 2028. This second-generation flagship would have featured a lighter, more comfortable design, more advanced displays, longer battery life, and a lower price point. The Air and Pro models together would establish a two-tier product structure, mirroring the ‌iPhone‌, iPad, MacBook, and AirPods product lines.

The Roadmap Changes


By mid-2024, momentum around the Vision Pro seemed to be shifting, with plans for future products being reorganized.

An essential report from The Information claimed that Apple had suspended development of the Vision Pro 2, redirecting its engineering resources to the cheaper Vision Air in hopes of accelerating its release. The company ostensibly recognized that the Pro's combination of high cost, bulk, discomfort, and limited use cases had narrowed its appeal even among early adopters.

At the time Apple began work on the device, it sought to release it at the end of 2024, but it still did not have a firm prototype by the middle of the year. The company was said to have struggled to find ways to reduce the model's costs without sacrificing too many features, with the target release date slipping to the end of 2025.

Meanwhile, by October, supply-chain leaks suggested Apple was winding down production of the original Vision Pro, citing weak demand and excess component stockpiles. The first-generation Vision Pro is believed to have ceased production at the end of the year.

Pausing Headset Development Entirely


This month, a bombshell report from Bloomberg said that Apple has also paused work on the lower-cost headset, the "Vision Air." Apple apparently wants to speed up development on a glasses product to better compete with Meta.



If reports from Bloomberg and The Information are true, development of both the Vision Air and the redesigned Vision Pro are paused, with no headset-class hardware in active development. While the company is unlikely to abandon spatial computing altogether, its next steps will almost certainly look very different from the headset it launched in 2024.

The M5 Vision Pro


Apple is about to debut its M5 family of chips, but today's Vision Pro still uses an M2 chip from 2022.

Apple is believed to have taken the decision to simply refresh the existing hardware with the M5 chip, potentially a second-generation coprocessor "R2" chip, and a new "Dual Knit" headband. This would enable it to keep the existing device up to date for a few more years, while making use of the stockpile of components left over from the first-generation model. This device is expected to launch in the next few weeks, even being leaked by FCC filings.

What Next?


The M5 Vision Pro should offer a reasonable update for users who like the device or potential customers who haven't yet tried it, but it is still unlikely to enjoy mass appeal or a radically different experience. The device is likely to support the headset product line for a period of time, but it will eventually become an outdated model if Apple offers no successors.


Apple is expected to launch its first smart glasses product as soon as next year, and it is possible that the company could resume work on the Vision Air and Vision Pro 2 once the glasses initiative is established. Nevertheless, Apple's headset is likely to enter a peculiar place around 2027 to 2028, with old hardware on sale and no sign of a refresh or replacement model.

For now, visionOS 26 and the upcoming M5 refresh show that Apple is still committed to mixed reality headsets, but where the product line goes further in the future amid a sudden pivot to smart glasses and artificial intelligence is anyone's guess.
This article, "Vision Pro Future Uncertain as All Headset Development Is Seemingly Paused" first appeared on MacRumors.com

items.title: 苹果传闻将在M5 Pro和M5 Max型号之前推出搭载M5芯片的MacBook Pro (原标题: Apple Rumored to Launch MacBook Pro With M5 Chip Before M5 Pro and M5 Max Models)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
## 苹果M5芯片MacBook Pro发布策略：先基础款，后Pro/Max

根据AppleInsider的消息来源，苹果公司计划采取分批发布策略，首先推出搭载标准M5芯片的MacBook Pro基础款，随后再发布搭载M5 Pro和M5 Max芯片的高端型号。

### M5芯片MacBook Pro基础款
*   **发布时间：** 据称“即将发布”，目前正在使用未发布的macOS 26.0.2版本进行测试。
*   **型号推测：** 可能是基础款14英寸MacBook Pro。
*   **支持证据：** 美国联邦通信委员会（FCC）文件显示只有一个未发布的MacBook Pro型号，进一步支持了这一推测。

### M5 Pro和M5 Max芯片MacBook Pro型号
*   **发布时间：** 预计在2026年初。
*   **预装系统：** 将预装macOS 26.3，该版本预计在1月发布。
*   **型号：** 包括14英寸和16英寸版本。

### 分批发布先例
苹果此前曾有分批发布MacBook Pro的先例：
*   **M1芯片：** 2020年11月推出13英寸MacBook Pro，而M1 Pro和M1 Max芯片的14英寸和16英寸型号直到2021年10月才发布。
*   **M2芯片：** 2022年6月推出13英寸MacBook Pro，M2 Pro和M2 Max芯片的14英寸和16英寸型号于2023年1月发布。
*   此趋势在13英寸MacBook Pro停产后停止，M3和M4系列均同步发布。
*   这种分批发布策略可能解释了此前关于2025年末和2026年初发布时间的矛盾传闻。

### M5芯片性能与其他设备
*   **性能提升：** 根据iPad Pro的早期开箱视频，M5芯片的多核CPU性能比M4芯片提升高达12%，图形性能提升高达36%。
*   **芯片规格：** 采用9核CPU，由台积电第三代3纳米工艺制造。
*   **其他M5设备：** iPad Pro和Vision Pro也预计在今年更新M5芯片。

### 未来MacBook Pro的重大变革（M6芯片时代）
预计在两代之后（M6芯片），MacBook Pro将迎来重大升级，可能包括：
*   OLED显示屏
*   触控功能
*   更薄的设计
*   内置蜂窝网络连接
*   M6芯片将采用台积电先进的2纳米工艺制造，带来更大的年度性能提升。

### 其他Mac产品更新
*   MacBook Air、iMac、Mac mini和Mac Studio的新型号预计要到明年（2026年）才会推出。
*   文章未提及Mac Pro台式机。

### 苹果发布会
目前尚不清楚苹果是否会在10月举办发布会，或者仅通过新闻稿和短视频发布新产品。

![Apple MacBook Pro M4 hero](https://images.macrumors.com/t/vmu3RcJ2zXzRTUhya6-707NJq04=/400x0/article-new/2024/10/Apple-MacBook-Pro-M4-hero.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 苹果据传将采取分批策略，先推出搭载标准M5芯片的MacBook Pro基础款，预计即将发布。随后，搭载M5 Pro和M5 Max芯片的高端14英寸和16英寸MacBook Pro型号将于2026年初上市。M5芯片预计在多核CPU和图形性能上比M4有显著提升，并将首先应用于iPad Pro和Vision Pro。这种发布模式与M1、M2芯片时代类似。未来MacBook Pro（M6时代）有望迎来OLED显示屏和触控功能等重大升级。
items.translated_title: 苹果传闻将在M5 Pro和M5 Max型号之前推出搭载M5芯片的MacBook Pro
items.content:
Apple is planning to release a base MacBook Pro with a standard M5 chip before higher-end models with M5 Pro and M5 Max chips, according to AppleInsider's sources with "knowledge of macOS Tahoe development and hardware testing."


The report said a MacBook Pro with an M5 chip is "nearing release," and Apple has apparently been testing this model with an unreleased macOS 26.0.2 version.

14-inch and 16-inch MacBook Pro models with M5 Pro and M5 Max chips are expected to follow in early 2026, with macOS 26.3 preinstalled, the report added. Following beta testing, macOS 26.3 will likely be released in January.

There is precedent for a decoupled launch. Apple updated the 13-inch MacBook Pro with the M1 chip in November 2020, but 14-inch and 16-inch MacBook Pro models with M1 Pro and M1 Max chips did not debut until October 2021. Then, the 13-inch MacBook Pro was updated with the M2 chip in June 2022, with 14-inch and 16-inch MacBook Pro models with M2 Pro and M2 Max chips following in January 2023.

That trend stopped once the 13-inch MacBook Pro was discontinued. The entire 14-inch and 16-inch MacBook Pro lineup was updated with M3, M3 Pro, and M3 Max chips all at once in October 2023, and 14-inch and 16-inch models with M4, M4 Pro, and M4 Max chips debuted simultaneously in October 2024.

Last month, U.S. Federal Communications Commission (FCC) documents surfaced for only a single unreleased MacBook Pro model, which further suggests that Apple might be planning to release a base 14-inch MacBook Pro with an M5 chip soon, followed by higher-end models with M5 Pro and M5 Max chips early next year.

In fact, this split launch could explain why rumors flip flopped between late 2025 and early 2026 timeframes. Ultimately, it sounds like it will be both.

Other devices expected to be updated with the M5 chip this year include the iPad Pro and the Vision Pro. It is still not clear if Apple plans to host an October event, or if it will announce new products with press releases and shorter videos only.

An early unboxing video for the next iPad Pro already revealed that the M5 chip will offer up to 12% faster multi-core CPU performance, and up to 36% faster graphics performance, compared to the M4 chip in the current iPad Pro. The chip still has a 9-core CPU, and it is manufactured with TSMC's third-generation 3nm process.

Bigger changes to the MacBook Pro are expected with the two-generations-away models, with rumored upgrades including an OLED display, touchscreen capabilities, a thinner design, built-in cellular connectivity, and M6 chips manufactured with TSMC's advanced 2nm process, for even greater year-over-year performance gains.

New models of the MacBook Air, iMac, Mac mini, and Mac Studio are not expected to launch until next year, but the report did not mention the Mac Pro desktop tower.
Related Roundup: MacBook Pro
Tag: AppleInsider
Buyer's Guide: MacBook Pro (Don't Buy)
Related Forum: MacBook Pro

This article, "Apple Rumored to Launch MacBook Pro With M5 Chip Before M5 Pro and M5 Max Models" first appeared on MacRumors.com

items.title: 本周最佳苹果优惠：AirPods 4 仅售 $89，AirTag 仅售 $64.99，更多 Prime Day 促销仍在进行中 (原标题: Best Apple Deals of the Week: AirPods 4 for $89, AirTag for $64.99, and More Prime Day Sales Still Available)
items.creator: Mitchel Broussard
items.summary:
# 本周最佳苹果优惠：Prime Day 促销余温不减

尽管 Prime Big Deal Days 官方活动已结束，但亚马逊上仍有大量苹果产品的优惠折扣，涵盖 AirPods 4、MacBook Air、iPad 等。

![万圣节主题英雄图片](https://images.macrumors.com/t/Ah9Mee1Wvrz_0LnWTWi7a7G7e7w=/400x0/article-new/2024/10/halloween-hero.jpeg?lossy)

## AirPods 优惠

*   **折扣详情：** AirPods Max、AirPods 4 等产品最高可享 $120 的折扣。
*   **主要亮点：**
    *   AirPods 4 降至 **$89.00**，原价 $129.00。
    *   AirPods Pro 2 也享有 $79 的大幅折扣。
*   **购买渠道：** 亚马逊

![AirPods 4 万圣节主题图片](https://images.macrumors.com/t/77vRTAs0Wp6hEpOcuOYu9GABegE=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/airpods-4-halloween.jpeg?lossy)

## 苹果配件优惠

*   **折扣详情：** AirTag、iPhone 17 保护壳等产品价格创历史新低。
*   **主要亮点：**
    *   iPhone 17 Pro TechWoven 保护壳降至 **$44.00**，原价 $59.00，创历史新低。
    *   Apple Pencil Pro、MagSafe 充电器和 AirTag 四件装也有不错的优惠。
*   **购买渠道：** 亚马逊

![AirTag 万圣节主题图片](https://images.macrumors.com/t/zO1nwFYsbyLl11n1Hbh3DujaOnY=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/airtag-halloween.jpeg?lossy)

## 竞争对手促销活动

*   **参与商家：** 索尼、三星和百思买。
*   **折扣详情：** Prime Day 期间出现的竞争性促销活动仍在进行中，提供全站范围的低价优惠。
*   **主要亮点：** 包括索尼热门降噪耳机和三星电视等产品的折扣。

![索尼万圣节主题图片](https://images.macrumors.com/t/KqfetexNBI5MJAmNH1qodC__6F0=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/sony-halloween.jpeg?lossy)

## iPad 优惠

*   **折扣详情：** iPad 产品最高可享 $150 的折扣。
*   **主要亮点：**
    *   11 英寸 iPad 价格创历史新低。
    *   M3 iPad Air 享受 $150 的大幅折扣。
*   **购买渠道：** 亚马逊

![iPad 万圣节主题图片](https://images.macrumors.com/t/GCLM1RvZVg_HP5S-VWfdsyFLo8s=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/ipad-halloween.jpeg?lossy)

## MacBook Air 优惠

*   **折扣详情：** M4 MacBook Air 优惠 $200。
*   **主要亮点：**
    *   13 英寸 256GB M4 MacBook Air 降至 **$799.00**，原价 $999.00。
    *   15 英寸 256GB M4 MacBook Air 降至 **$999.00**，原价 $1,199.00。
    *   以上均为历史最低价。
*   **购买渠道：** 亚马逊

![MacBook Air 万圣节主题图片](https://images.macrumors.com/t/U75Iqzw2ihomIt54lBQwNDgQzrI=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/macbook-air-halloween.jpeg?lossy)

## 更多信息

*   如需了解更多折扣，请访问 Apple Deals 汇总页面。
*   订阅 Deals Newsletter 可获取假日季最佳优惠的最新动态。
items.shortSummary: Prime Big Deal Days结束后，亚马逊仍提供多项苹果产品优惠。AirPods 4 降至 $89，AirPods Pro 2 也有折扣。iPhone 17 Pro TechWoven 保护壳创历史新低 $44，AirTag 四件装等配件有售。iPad 最高优惠 $150，M3 iPad Air 和 11 英寸 iPad 价格诱人。M4 MacBook Air 享 $200 折扣，13 英寸和 15 英寸型号均创历史新低。索尼、三星和百思买等零售商的竞争性促销活动仍在继续。
items.translated_title: 本周最佳苹果优惠：AirPods 4 仅售 $89，AirTag 仅售 $64.99，更多 Prime Day 促销仍在进行中
items.content:
This week was Prime Big Deal Days, and although the event is officially over, we're still tracking great leftover discounts on Amazon. This includes ongoing low prices on AirPods 4, MacBook Air, iPads, and more.

Note: MacRumors is an affiliate partner with some of these vendors. When you click a link and make a purchase, we may receive a small payment, which helps us keep the site running.

AirPods



  • What's the deal? Take up to $120 off AirPods Max, AirPods 4, and more

items.title: 部分洛杉矶湖人队比赛将在Vision Pro上获得3D直播 (原标题: Some Los Angeles Lakers Games Will Get 3D Live Streams on Vision Pro)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
### 洛杉矶湖人队比赛将在Vision Pro上进行3D直播

苹果公司宣布，在2025-26赛季期间，部分洛杉矶湖人队的比赛将通过Apple Vision Pro以Apple Immersive格式进行直播。

**主要特点与技术：**

*   **直播平台：** 3D比赛将通过Vision Pro上即将推出的Spectrum SportsNet应用进行直播，预计从明年年初开始。具体的赛程将在今年晚些时候公布。
*   **沉浸式体验：** Apple Immersive视频采用180度8K录制，并结合空间音频，旨在让观众“仿佛置身于球场边，感受每场比赛的激烈，提供传统广播无法捕捉的视角”。
*   **拍摄技术：** 比赛的Apple Immersive画面将使用Blackmagic Design公司即将于明年上市的新款URSA Cine Immersive Live摄像机进行捕捉。

**观看要求与限制：**

*   **订阅：** 观看直播需要订阅Spectrum互联网套餐或Spectrum SportsNet+服务。
*   **系统版本：** 需要visionOS 26操作系统。
*   **地域限制：** 直播仅限于湖人队的广播覆盖区域内，包括南加州、南内华达州和夏威夷。

**点播内容：**

*   比赛结束后一到三天内，Apple Immersive格式的完整比赛回放和精彩集锦将在Vision Pro上的Spectrum SportsNet和NBA应用中提供点播服务。

**图片：**
![Vision Pro NBA](https://images.macrumors.com/t/slqcgsA2lM63lj9JTx6eHPXcK24=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/Vision-Pro-NBA.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 苹果公司宣布，2025-26赛季部分洛杉矶湖人队比赛将通过Apple Vision Pro进行3D直播。观众需订阅Spectrum服务并使用visionOS 26，在湖人队广播区域内，通过Spectrum SportsNet应用体验180度8K沉浸式视角。比赛回放和集锦也将提供点播。
items.translated_title: 部分洛杉矶湖人队比赛将在Vision Pro上获得3D直播
items.content:
A selection of Los Angeles Lakers games during the 2025-26 season will be live streamed in the Apple Immersive format on the Apple Vision Pro.


The 3D games will be streamed in the forthcoming Spectrum SportsNet app on the Vision Pro, starting early next year, according to Apple. A schedule will be shared later this year. A subscription to a Spectrum internet plan or Spectrum SportsNet+ is needed to watch the live broadcasts, and visionOS 26 is also required. In addition, the live broadcasts are only available within Lakers broadcasting territory, in Southern California, Southern Nevada, and Hawaii.

Apple Immersive videos are 180-degree 8K recordings, captured with Spatial Audio.

"Viewers will feel the intensity of each game as if they were courtside, with perspectives impossible to capture in traditional broadcasts," says Apple.

Apple Immersive footage of the games will be captured with Blackmagic Design's new URSA Cine Immersive Live camera, which will be available for purchase next year.

Full game replays and highlights in the Apple Immersive format will be available on demand in both the Spectrum SportsNet and NBA apps on the Vision Pro, one to three days after the conclusion of each game, according to Apple.

More details were shared by TechRadar.
Related Roundup: Apple Vision Pro
Tags: Apple Immersive, NBA
Buyer's Guide: Vision Pro (Don't Buy)
Related Forum: Apple Vision Pro

This article, "Some Los Angeles Lakers Games Will Get 3D Live Streams on Vision Pro" first appeared on MacRumors.com

Discuss this article in our forums

items.title: MacRumors 赠品活动：赢取 ColorWare 定制配色 AirPods Pro 3 (原标题: MacRumors Giveaway: Win Custom-Colored AirPods Pro 3 From ColorWare)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
## MacRumors 赠品活动：赢取 ColorWare 定制配色 AirPods Pro 3

MacRumors 宣布与 ColorWare 合作，为读者提供赢取一副定制喷漆 AirPods Pro 3 的机会。苹果发布 AirPods Pro 3 不到一个月，ColorWare 便迅速推出了定制选项。

### 关于 ColorWare
*   **公司背景**：ColorWare 是一家拥有二十多年定制苹果产品经验的公司。
*   **定制服务**：
    *   提供数百种独特的颜色和表面处理，包括光泽、哑光、金属色或金属哑光。
    *   可选择彩虹中的任何颜色，例如光泽黑、亮橙、闪亮金、暗哑蓝。
    *   还提供霓虹高可视度颜色和具有虹彩变色效果的“幻影”色调。
    *   用户可以选择 AirPods 和充电盒同色，或为每个耳塞和充电盒选择不同的定制颜色。

![ColorWare 定制黑色 AirPods Pro 3](https://images.macrumors.com/t/o_vol6rxi9iTXZ5LzzxmwVa9e3w=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/colorware-airpods-pro-3-black.jpg?lossy)
![ColorWare 定制紫色 AirPods Pro 3](https://images.macrumors.com/t/6jdHFGcI3bduQ77D6bRsdRYEY-Y=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/colorware-airpods-pro-3-purple.jpg?lossy)

### AirPods Pro 3 功能与定制价格
*   **核心功能**：除了定制颜色，ColorWare 的 AirPods Pro 3 功能与苹果原版相同，包括：
    *   改进的主动降噪 (Active Noise Cancellation)
    *   更好的音频质量
    *   带有泡沫耳塞的新型佩戴方式
    *   心率感应功能
*   **定制价格**：
    *   定制 AirPods Pro 3（耳塞和充电盒）：439 美元。
    *   仅定制耳塞：389 美元。
    *   额外 20 美元可提供文本或符号雕刻服务。

![ColorWare 定制橙色 AirPods Pro 3](https://images.macrumors.com/t/z-gznTV5kDxoEbBAaSCx6bT3ncw=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/colorware-airpods-pro-3-orange.jpg?lossy)

### ColorWare 的其他产品与工艺
*   **其他定制产品**：ColorWare 还提供其他苹果产品的定制服务，如 Apple Pencil、AirPods 4、Mac mini、AirPods Max 和 AirTags。
*   **定制工艺**：采用多步涂层工艺，包括底漆、专有颜色配方和 X2 液体塑料涂层，以保护颜色。
*   **质保**：定制喷漆提供 12 个月的质保。
*   **市场反响**：ColorWare 的 AirPods Pro 3 推出仅数周，便因其受欢迎程度而出现积压订单，预计要到明年一月才能发货。

![ColorWare 定制黄色 AirPods Pro 3](https://images.macrumors.com/t/TRpGJ6J1qKdz47S2Y4t6Ncuj8t=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/colorware-airpods-pro-3-yellow.jpg?lossy)

### MacRumors 赠品活动详情
*   **奖品**：MacRumors 将赠送三套定制 AirPods Pro 3。
*   **参与方式**：
    1.  使用文章中的小部件，并输入电子邮件地址。电子邮件仅用于联系获奖者和发送奖品。
    2.  通过订阅每周新闻通讯、订阅 YouTube 频道、在 Twitter、Instagram、Threads 上关注我们，或访问 MacRumors Facebook 页面，可获得额外参赛资格。
*   **参赛资格**：
    *   仅限 18 岁或以上的美国居民。
    *   18 岁或以上的英国居民。
    *   在其省份或地区达到法定成年年龄的加拿大居民。
    *   所有联邦、州、省和/或地方税费和附加费均由获奖者自行承担。
*   **活动时间**：
    *   从太平洋时间 10 月 10 日上午 9:00 开始，至 10 月 17 日上午 9:00 结束。
    *   获奖者将于 10 月 17 日或之后不久随机选出，并通过电子邮件联系。
    *   获奖者需在 48 小时内回复并提供收货地址，否则将重新选择获奖者。
items.shortSummary: MacRumors 联合 ColorWare 举办赠品活动，送出三副定制配色的 AirPods Pro 3。ColorWare 是一家拥有二十多年经验的苹果产品定制公司，提供数百种颜色和多种表面处理选项，可定制 AirPods Pro 3 的耳塞和充电盒。定制版功能与原版相同，但因受欢迎已积压订单至明年一月。此次赠品活动面向美国、英国和加拿大居民，截止日期为太平洋时间 10 月 17 日上午 9:00。
items.translated_title: MacRumors 赠品活动：赢取 ColorWare 定制配色 AirPods Pro 3
items.content:
For this week's giveaway, we've teamed up with ColorWare to offer MacRumors readers a chance to win a pair of custom-painted AirPods Pro 3. It's been under a month since Apple released the AirPods Pro 3, so ColorWare didn't waste any time getting started on custom options.


If you're not familiar with ColorWare, it's a company that's been customizing Apple products for over two decades now, and if you want AirPods in a color other than white, ColorWare can make it happen.

ColorWare products are available in hundreds of unique colors and finishes. You can get any color of the rainbow in a gloss, matte, metallic, or metallic matte finish. Want ‌AirPods Pro 3‌ in a glossy black? No problem. Bright orange, shiny gold, or dusky, matte blue? ColorWare has all of those options.


There's also a neon hi-vis color, and a set of illusion shades that have iridescent, shifting colors. You can get the AirPods and the case all the same color or choose separate, custom colors for each earbud and the case.

Aside from the custom color, the ‌AirPods Pro 3‌ work just like the stock version from Apple. The ‌AirPods Pro 3‌ offer improved Active Noise Cancellation, better audio quality, a new fit with foam-infused ear tips, and heart rate sensing.


Custom ‌AirPods Pro 3‌ from ColorWare are priced at $439, and that's the same price ColorWare has charged for prior versions of the AirPods too. The price includes the earbuds and the case, but you can also get customized earbuds for $389. And for another $20, you can get any text or symbol you want engraved on the AirPods.

You can also get other custom Apple products from ColorWare, like the Apple Pencil, AirPods 4, Mac mini, AirPods Max, and AirTags.

ColorWare uses a multi-step coating process that includes primer, a proprietary color formula, and an X2 liquid plastic coating that protects the color. Custom painting is guaranteed for 12 months.


ColorWare's ‌AirPods Pro 3‌ have only been available for a couple weeks, but they've proven so popular that they're backordered until January. If you want custom-colored AirPods, you might want to order now before the wait gets longer. MacRumors readers who win our giveaway will get to skip the line.

We have three sets of ‌AirPods Pro 3‌ to give away to MacRumors readers. To enter to win, use the widget below and enter an email address. Email addresses will be used solely for contact purposes to reach the winner(s) and send the prize(s). You can earn additional entries by subscribing to our weekly newsletter, subscribing to our YouTube channel, following us on Twitter, following us on Instagram, following us on Threads, or visiting the MacRumors Facebook page.

Due to the complexities of international laws regarding giveaways, only U.S. residents who are 18 years or older, UK residents who are 18 years or older, and Canadian residents who have reached the age of majority in their province or territory are eligible to enter. All federal, state, provincial, and/or local taxes, fees, and surcharges are the sole responsibility of the prize winner. To offer feedback or get more information on the giveaway restrictions, please refer to our Site Feedback section, as that is where discussion of the rules will be redirected.


ColorWare Giveaway
The contest will run from today (October 10) at 9:00 a.m. Pacific Time through 9:00 a.m. Pacific Time on October 17. The winner will be chosen randomly on or shortly after October 17 and will be contacted by email. The winner will have 48 hours to respond and provide a shipping address before a new winner is chosen.
Tag: Giveaway

This article, "MacRumors Giveaway: Win Custom-Colored AirPods Pro 3 From ColorWare" first appeared on MacRumors.com

Discuss this article in our forums

items.title: 圣地亚哥大区Apple Store将进行全新设计 (原标题: Apple Store in Greater San Diego Area to Receive All-New Design)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
### 圣地亚哥大区Apple Store将进行全新设计

苹果公司位于加利福尼亚州卡尔斯巴德市The Forum购物中心的零售店将进行全面改造，以引入全新的现代化设计和设施。

#### 改造计划详情
*   **地点**：该店位于圣地亚哥县的沿海城市卡尔斯巴德，于2008年开业。
*   **关闭时间**：根据苹果官网信息，该店将从10月15日（星期三）起暂时关闭，进行翻新工程。
*   **设计与设施**：改造后的门店将采用现代设计，并可能新增一个专用的Apple Pickup取货站，方便顾客在线订购后取货。
*   **重开时间**：苹果公司尚未公布原店的重开日期，但此类改造项目通常需要数月才能完成。

#### 临时店安排
*   **开业时间**：苹果将在同一广场开设一家临时店，并定于10月18日（星期六）上午10点（当地时间）盛大开业。
*   **位置与地址**：临时店将位于原店“右侧下方”，地址将从1923 Calle Barcelona变更为1925 Calle Barcelona。

#### 图片
![Apple Carlsbad](https://images.macrumors.com/t/1vEWtjl1lft9G6wFkIQW79o-1do=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/Apple-Carlsbad.jpeg?lossy)
*2021年的Apple Carlsbad店面*
items.shortSummary: 加利福尼亚州卡尔斯巴德市的Apple Store将进行全面改造，以引入现代化设计并可能新增Apple Pickup取货站。该店将于10月15日（星期三）起暂时关闭。在此期间，苹果将在同一广场开设一家临时店，并于10月18日（星期六）上午10点开业，地址为1925 Calle Barcelona。原店的改造预计需要数月时间。
items.translated_title: 圣地亚哥大区Apple Store将进行全新设计
items.content:
Apple's retail store at The Forum in Carlsbad, California will be receiving an all-new design.

Apple Carlsbad as of 2021

The store will be temporarily closed for renovations starting Wednesday, October 15, according to Apple's website. The location will be updated with a modern design and amenities, with a dedicated Apple Pickup station for online orders likely to be added.

Apple has not indicated when the original store will reopen, but these remodeling projects often take many months to be completed.

In the meantime, Apple will be opening a temporary store in the same plaza in Carlsbad, with a grand opening set for Saturday, October 18, at 10 a.m. local time. Apple says the temporary store will be located "just down to the right" from the original location, with the store's address set to shift from 1923 Calle Barcelona to 1925 Calle Barcelona.

Carlsbad is a coastal city in the County of San Diego. Apple opened its store there in 2008.
Tag: Apple Store

This article, "Apple Store in Greater San Diego Area to Receive All-New Design" first appeared on MacRumors.com

Discuss this article in our forums
